name: Dull Blade
desc: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

name: Silver Sword
desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

name: Cool Steel
desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

affix.name: Bane of Water and Ice
affix.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>.

name: Harbinger of Dawn
desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

affix.name: Vigorous
affix.desc: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>14%</color>.

name: Traveler's Handy Sword
desc: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

affix.name: Journey
affix.desc: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores <color=#99FFFFFF>1%</color> HP.

name: Dark Iron Sword
desc: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

affix.name: Overloaded
affix.desc: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> for 12s.

name: Fillet Blade
desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

affix.name: Gash
affix.desc: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal <color=#99FFFFFF>240%</color> ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>15</color>s.

name: Skyrider Sword
desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

affix.name: Determination
affix.desc: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

name: Favonius Sword
desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

affix.name: Windfall
affix.desc: CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

name: The Flute
desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

affix.name: Chord
affix.desc: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

name: Sacrificial Sword
desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

affix.name: Composed
affix.desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>30</color>s.

name: Royal Longsword
desc: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.

affix.name: Focus
affix.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Lion's Roar
desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

affix.name: Bane of Fire and Thunder
affix.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>.

name: Prototype Rancour
desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

affix.name: Smashed Stone
affix.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Iron Sting
desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

affix.name: Infusion Stinger
affix.desc: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

name: Blackcliff Longsword
desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

affix.name: Press the Advantage
affix.desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: The Black Sword
desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

affix.name: Justice
affix.desc: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Additionally, regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

name: Sword of Descension
desc: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

affix.name: Descension
affix.desc: Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to deal <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>66</color>.

name: Festering Desire
desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

affix.name: Undying Admiration
affix.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>16%</color> and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color>.

name: Aquila Favonia
desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil â€” just like the last heroine who wielded it.

affix.name: Falcon's Defiance
affix.desc: ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> of ATK and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

name: Skyward Blade
desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

affix.name: Sky-Piercing Fang
affix.desc: CRIT Rate increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color>. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>10%</color>, increases ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>10%</color>, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> for 12s.

name: Summit Shaper
desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

affix.name: Golden Majesty
affix.desc: Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Waster Greatsword
desc: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

name: Old Merc's Pal
desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

name: Ferrous Shadow
desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

affix.name: Unbending
affix.desc: When HP falls below <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color>, increases Charged Attack DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color> and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

affix.name: Bane of Fire and Thunder
affix.desc: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>.

name: White Iron Greatsword
desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

affix.name: Cull the Weak
affix.desc: Defeating an opponent restores <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> HP.

name: Quartz
desc: A simple but heavy greatsword made of polished black quartz with a golden gilt. It has an air of elegance and dignity about it.

affix.name: Residual Heat
affix.desc: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> for 12s.

name: Debate Club
desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

affix.name: Blunt Conclusion
affix.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

name: Skyrider Greatsword
desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

affix.name: Courage
affix.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

name: Favonius Greatsword
desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

affix.name: Windfall
affix.desc: CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

name: The Bell
desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

affix.name: Rebellious Guardian
affix.desc: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every <color=#99FFFFFF>45</color>s. While protected by the shield, the character gains <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> increased DMG.

name: Sacrificial Greatsword
desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

affix.name: Composed
affix.desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>30</color>s.

name: Royal Greatsword
desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.

affix.name: Focus
affix.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Rainslasher
desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

affix.name: Bane of Storm and Tide
affix.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>.

name: Prototype Archaic
desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

affix.name: Crush
affix.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>240%</color> ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Whiteblind
desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

affix.name: Infusion Blade
affix.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

name: Blackcliff Slasher
desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.

affix.name: Press the Advantage
affix.desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Serpent Spine
desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

affix.name: Wavesplitter
affix.desc: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> more DMG and take <color=#99FFFFFF>3%</color> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

affix.name: Frost Burial
affix.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Skyward Pride
desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

affix.name: Sky-ripping Dragon Spine
affix.desc: Increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

name: Wolf's Gravestone
desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

affix.name: Wolfish Tracker
affix.desc: Increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: The Unforged
desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

affix.name: Golden Majesty
affix.desc: Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Beginner's Protector
desc: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

name: Iron Point
desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

name: White Tassel
desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

affix.name: Sharp
affix.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>24%</color>.

name: Halberd
desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

affix.name: Heavy
affix.desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>160%</color> ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Black Tassel
desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

affix.name: Bane of the Soft
affix.desc: Increases DMG against slimes by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>.

name: The Flagstaff
desc: Reserve

affix.name: TBD
affix.desc: Defeating an opponent restores <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> HP.

name: Dragon's Bane
desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

affix.name: Bane of Flame and Water
affix.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>.

name: Prototype Starglitter
desc: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

affix.name: Magic Affinity
affix.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Crescent Pike
desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

affix.name: Infusion Needle
affix.desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> ATK DMG for 5s.

name: Blackcliff Pole
desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

affix.name: Press the Advantage
affix.desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Deathmatch
desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

affix.name: Gladiator
affix.desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>16%</color> and DEF is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>16%</color>. If there are less than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>24%</color>.

name: Favonius Lance
desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

affix.name: Windfall
affix.desc: CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

name: Royal Spear
desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

affix.name: Focus
affix.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Dragonspine Spear
desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

affix.name: Frost Burial
affix.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Skyward Spine
desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

affix.name: Black Wing
affix.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

name: Vortex Vanquisher
desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

affix.name: Golden Majesty
affix.desc: Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

affix.name: Eagle Spear of Justice
affix.desc: On hit, increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>3.2%</color> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>.

name: Apprentice's Notes
desc: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

name: Pocket Grimoire
desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

name: Magic Guide
desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

affix.name: Bane of Storm and Tide
affix.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>.

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

affix.name: Heritage
affix.desc: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>24%</color> for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

name: Otherworldly Story
desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

affix.name: Energy Shower
affix.desc: Picking up an Elemental Energy Orb/Particle recovers <color=#99FFFFFF>1%</color> HP.

name: Emerald Orb
desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. It is small, light, and durable.

affix.name: Rapids
affix.desc: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> for 12s.

name: Twin Nephrite
desc: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

affix.name: Guerilla Tactics
affix.desc: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> for 15s.

name: Amber Bead
desc: A catalyst carved out of amber that gains a warm halo under the sun.

affix.name: Elemental Mastery
affix.desc: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Favonius Codex
desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

affix.name: Windfall
affix.desc: CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

name: The Widsith
desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

affix.name: Debut
affix.desc: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color>. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>48%</color>. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>240</color>.

name: Sacrificial Fragments
desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

affix.name: Composed
affix.desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>30</color>s.

name: Royal Grimoire
desc: A book that once belonged to a royal mage of Mondstadt. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

affix.name: Focus
affix.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Solar Pearl
desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon, and pulses with a warm strength.

affix.name: Solar Shine
affix.desc: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color> for 6s.

name: Prototype Amber
desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

affix.name: Gilding
affix.desc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>4</color> Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate <color=#99FFFFFF>4</color>% HP every 2s for this duration.

name: Mappa Mare
desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

affix.name: Infusion Scroll
affix.desc: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Blackcliff Agate
desc: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.

affix.name: Press the Advantage
affix.desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Eye of Perception
desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

affix.name: Echo
affix.desc: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>240%</color> ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

name: Frostbearer
desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

affix.name: Frost Burial
affix.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Skyward Atlas
desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and its former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

affix.name: Wandering Clouds
affix.desc: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>160%</color> ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
localeName: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

affix.name: Boundless Blessing
affix.desc: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

name: Memory of Dust
desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

affix.name: Golden Majesty
affix.desc: Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Hunter's Bow
desc: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

name: Raven Bow
desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

affix.name: Bane of Flame and Water
affix.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>.

name: Sharpshooter's Oath
desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

affix.name: Precise
affix.desc: Increases DMG against weak spots by <color=#99FFFFFF>24%</color>.

name: Recurve Bow
desc: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

affix.name: Cull the Weak
affix.desc: Defeating an opponent restores <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> HP.

name: Slingshot
desc: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

affix.name: Slingshot
affix.desc: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>36%</color>. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

name: Messenger
desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

affix.name: Archer's Message
affix.desc: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Ebony Bow
desc: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is also a far more powerful weapon.

affix.name: Decimate
affix.desc: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>.

name: Favonius Warbow
desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

affix.name: Windfall
affix.desc: CRIT Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

name: The Stringless
desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

affix.name: Arrowless Song
affix.desc: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>24%</color>.

name: Sacrificial Bow
desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

affix.name: Composed
affix.desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>30</color>s.

name: Royal Bow
desc: An old royal longbow that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.

affix.name: Focus
affix.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Rust
desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

affix.name: Rapid Firing
affix.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

name: Prototype Crescent
desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

affix.name: Unreturning
affix.desc: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>36%</color> for 10s.

name: Compound Bow
desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

affix.name: Infusion Arrow
affix.desc: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> and Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>1.2%</color> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Blackcliff Warbow
desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

affix.name: Press the Advantage
affix.desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: The Viridescent Hunt
desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

affix.name: Verdant Wind
affix.desc: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>14</color>s.

name: Skyward Harp
desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

affix.name: Echoing Ballad
affix.desc: Increases CRIT DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Hits have a <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>4</color>s.

name: Amos' Bow
desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

affix.name: Strong-Willed
affix.desc: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Normal and Charged Attack DMG increases by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> every 0.1s for up to 5 times.

name: Dreams of Dragonfell
desc: A great bow that once shot clean through a giant dragon. Once released, the impetus of its bowstring resembles a peal of thunder.

affix.name: Golden Majesty
affix.desc: Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
